author.name: Conchobar mac Dubhthach
author.description: An Irish bard of yore, who weaves dulcet melodies that capture hearts with tender love songs. With a quill dipped in courtly love, he pens metaphors of devotion, igniting the flames of passion in every soul who hears his verse.

newsMedieval:
In land of rising sun, a scene quite dire,
Two iron birds in fated meeting, catch the sky afire.
Alas, fair Haneda weeps with doomed desire,
Stricken field of winged dreams reduced to mire.

In eastern pearl of Hong Kong, strife does embroil,
A knight named Lai, by law, is brought to royal foil.
Accused of weaving plots in foreign soil,
His pleas of innocence deepen the coil.

Bright Venture funds, we look upon you with doubt,
Your prophecies of fortune, we scout with clout.
Lustrous dreams may shimmer and spout,
But 'tis solid gold we seek, not impish bout.

feedItems.title: Japan Airlines Plane in Flames After Collision at Tokyo's Haneda Airport
feedItems.description: The passenger jet collided with a Japan Coast Guard plane on Tuesday evening local time, according to the country’s public broadcaster NHK.

feedItems.title: Hong Kong Dissident's Tweets, Ties To Trump Officials Cited in National Security Trial
feedItems.description: Prosecutors alleged media tycoon Jimmy Lai was the mastermind of a conspiracy to urge Western governments to sanction Chinese and Hong Kong officials. He pleaded not guilty to the charges.

feedItems.title: LPs Doubt Venture Funds' Startup Valuations
feedItems.description: Investors in venture funds are scrutinizing unrealized returns for overly optimistic projections, slowing down fundraising processes.

author.name: Guillemette de Ventadour
author.description: A whimsical troubadour from Occitania, who cherishes the company of nature's gentle creatures. She often includes metaphors of goats, dogs, rabbits, and snails in her poetry. Her writing style is terse.

newsMedieval:
In market's maze, as goat keenly strays,
Dollar ascends, its worth weighs,
Awaiting whispers of data's sway,
Midst Fed's next turn, in balance lays.

Once rabbits, swift in market's glaze,
Lucid, Lordstown, Faraday plays,
Now snails withering in the gaze,
Meet harbingers of zero days.

Of thy wealth's nest, attention pays,
Oft to look, none to laze,
In 401(k)'s winding ways,
Lies chance unseen, if gaze delays.

feedItems.title: Dollar Firms as Market Awaits Data For Insight into Fed's Next Move
feedItems.description: The dollar rose against a basket of currencies as the market awaits U.S. economic data releases this week for insight into the Fed’s next move, XS.com said.

feedItems.title: Why Short Sellers Are Targeting Struggling EV Companies
feedItems.description: Electric vehicle manufacturers like Lucid, Lordstown Motors and Faraday Futures were big winners of the stock boom two years ago. Now all three companies’ shares are about to hit zero.

feedItems.title: How Often Should You Mess With Your 401(k)? More Than Before
feedItems.description: Compulsively checking your 401(k) is seen by behavioral economists as the source of bad investment decisions. Right now, though, looking at your portfolio too seldom could equally lead to missed opportunities.

author.name: Æthelred the Skald
author.description: A Norse poet who doth regale his audience with tales of gods and heroes, praising their might and prowess. He references Norse mythology and history in his poems. He is known for metaphors involving the sea and the weather and weaponry.

newsMedieval:
Upon the horns of coming year, a shroud doth twist and stand,
Checklist in hand, the finance chieftains brace ‘gainst shifting sand.
As weaving wyrd spins frugal fates, they seek to understand,
In sea of uncertainty, they, as skippers, must command.

Once, 'twas hoped, by Gungnir's point, stability would reign,
A longing, deep as Mimir's well to see calm seas again.
Investors, in their mead-halls, wait with hearts a-bristle, dreading,
With Odin's patience holding fast to see the scales un-wedding.

There in a fortress, known as Juul, a battle raged, 'twas testing,
Held at bay was bankruptcy, by gilded shields' investing.
With Hyatt's heir and raider bold, their coins did find a purpose,
Now cries of foul echo loud, in saga far from wordless.

feedItems.title: As CFOs Prepare for an Unpredictable 2024, Here's What Tops Their Checklists
feedItems.description: From managing talent and controlling costs to monitoring macroeconomic trends and forging new partnerships, corporate finance chiefs are girding for volatility and uncertainty ahead.

feedItems.title: Investors' Hope for 2024: A Return to Long-Lost Normalcy
feedItems.description: Many think markets can find a more stable equilibrium after recent rate increases.

feedItems.title: Wealthy Investors Rescued Juul From Bankruptcy. Others Are Crying Foul.
feedItems.description: Two of Juul Labs’ longtime directors—a Hyatt Hotels heir and a venture capitalist—helped bail out the e-cigarette maker from the edge of insolvency. Now other investors are suing.

author.name: Brother Arnulfus
author.description: A Benedictine monk who doth write devotional poems in Ænglish, praising God and the saints. His poems are often humorous, short, and satirical. They often contain metaphors of alcohol, especially wine or ale.

newsMedieval:
Of India's grain, fertile and fine,
A precious gem in the world's vine.
Its yield, by climate harsh, brought low,
A worldly woe both far and nigh, we know.

In realms of streams where tales are told,
Americans find their hearts grown cold.
For Hulu's charm, they bid adieu,
Turning to bundles, cheap and new.

With disruptions new, geopolitics entwine,
Quickly do plans seek 2024’s line.
In wake of pestilence that shadow casts,
Swift must they act, to holdfast their masts.

feedItems.title: India's Food-Security Problem Is the World's, Too
feedItems.description: India’s tightly controlled agricultural market has left food production highly vulnerable to climate change. That’s a global problem: India is a major food exporter.

feedItems.title: Americans Are Canceling More of Their Streaming Services
feedItems.description: Hulu and other streamers are turning to bundles, discounts and ad-supported plans as customer defections rise.

feedItems.title: New Disruptions, Geopolitics Hang Over 2024 Supply Chains
feedItems.description: Companies that assembled new supply chain strategies in the wake of the Covid-19 pandemic are having to put those plans into practice far faster than they may have thought possible.
